title: Definition of inverse variation
text: In an inverse relationship, variables are inversely proportional. This means that as $$x$$ increases, $$y$$ decreases, and vice versa.

title: General form
text: If "y varies inversely as x," then the general form of our relationship will be $$y=\frac{k}{x}$$.

title: Solving for k.
text: Substitute $$x=4$$ and $$y=2$$ into our relationship $$y$$ $$=$$ $$\frac{k}{x}$$ to solve for k. What do you get?

title: Put it all together
text: Now all you have to do is substitute k into the general form to get your equation!
